name: Eternal Duty
description:
Defend your planet from catastrophic events. Enormous gorges, frosty ice storms, erupting volcanoes and giant meteors. Withstand the forces of nature and help your civilization to stay alive in this mad world.

This is a game made during the Hagenberg Game Jam 2019, where students were given 36 hours to develop a game with the topic "2 Minutes to Midnight".

You can also check out the other game jam games here:
https://hagenberg-gamejam.at/2019/
